column4: Yeah, I seriously need some help .. Something is seriously wrong I think
Xlib: connection to ":0.0" refused by server
I can't run anything for some reason, can someone help?
what is the output of ls -a ~/.[xX]*
Can I PM it to you?
no, pastebin it if you must, it should only be one line
It's multiple lines, and I can't open firefox, so how do you expect me to pastebin it?
if i was looking for .xsession-errors I would have asked for it
Then do you want xmms, xine, or xchat2?
so the entries are .xsession-erorrs, .Xauthority, xmms, xine, and xchat2?
Says no such package "linx", but "lynx" is installing.
w3m is installed by default as well i think
before you do any of this, try deleting .Xauthority and restarting X
